resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107205</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107205</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202762</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Family Budget Activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie Etat-Aktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité De Budget de Famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade Do Orçamento Da Família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività Del Preventivo Della Famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα οικογενειακών προϋπολογισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividad Del Presupuesto De la Familia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity is designed to provide students with real-world application of classroom curriculum. Students will be required to make budgeting decisions in the light of inflation, unemployment, and other unforeseen additions or strains to the family budget.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität ist konzipiert, um Kursteilnehmer
mit realistischer Anwendung des Klassenzimmerlehrplans zu versehen. 
Kursteilnehmer werden benoetigt, planende Entscheidungen 
angesichts der Inflation, Arbeitslosigkeit und andere unvorhergesehene
Hinzufügung oder Belastungen zum Familie Etat zu treffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité est conçue pour fournir à des 
étudiants l'application réelle du programme d'études de salle de 
classe. Des étudiants seront requis de prendre des décisions 
économisantes à la lumière de l'inflation, le chômage, et d'autres
ajouts ou contraintes imprévus au budget de famille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade é projetada fornecer estudantes 
com a aplicação real-world do curriculum da sala de aula. Os 
estudantes serão requeridos fazer decisões incluindo no orçamento 
na luz da inflação, o desemprego, e outras adições ou tensões 
unforeseen ao orçamento da família.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività è destinata per fornire agli 
allievi l'applicazione nell'ambiente del programma di studi dell'aula.
Gli allievi saranno tenuti a prendere le decisioni stanzianti 
alla luce di inflazione, disoccupazione ed altri aggiunte o sforzi 
imprevisti al preventivo della famiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα έχει ως σκοπό να παρέχει στους 
σπουδαστές την πραγματική εφαρμογή του προγράμματος σπουδών 
τάξεων. Οι σπουδαστές θα απαιτηθούν για να κάνουν τη 
σύνταξη προϋπολογισμού των αποφάσεων λαμβάνοντας υπόψη τον 
πληθωρισμό, την ανεργία, και άλλες απρόβλεπτες προσθήκες ή 
πιέσεις στον οικογενειακό προϋπολογισμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad se diseña para proveer de 
estudiantes la aplicación del mundo real del plan de estudios de la 
sala de clase. Requerirán a los estudiantes tomar decisiones de
presupuesto en la luz de la inflación, desempleo, y otras adiciones o
tensiones imprevistas al presupuesto de la familia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BETH CARROLL

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107205</entry>
